product_name: DIBS BeautyJam Jam Lip Plumping Lipstick Melt
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty’s Jam Jam Lip Plumping Lipstick Melt is an ultra-luxe, semi-spicy plumping lip melt that delivers buildable color and nourishing hydration.
details: DetailsFeaturesComfy plump you can seeThe jammy texture you can feelBuildable, long-lasting colorDecadent demi shinePointed teardrop applicatorA lip luxe formula with castor oil, peptides, and hyaluronic acidWarming peach and orange-vanilla scentKey IngredientsCastor Oil: Deeply hydrates lips for a smooth, nourished feelPeptides: Helps boost lip firmness and improve overall appearance over timeHyaluronic Acid: Provides intense hydration and a plumped, soft lookCaffeine: Invigorates lips with a subtle energizing effectPeach & Orange-Vanilla Flavor: Delivers a refreshing, fruity-sweet scentVanillyl Butyl Ether: Creates a gentle, tingly sensationFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenItem 2636507How To UseOutline Your Lips: Using the pointed tip of the tear drop applicator, start by outlining your lips. Begin at the cupid's bow and work your way to the corners, following the natural shape of your lips.Fill In: Once the outline is complete, use the flat side of the tear drop applicator to fill in the rest of your lips with color. Swipe the lipstick evenly across your lips, making sure to cover all areas.Build Up Color: For a more intense color payoff, apply additional layers.IngredientsBlueberry Ice: Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Microcrystalline Wax, Ceresin, Castor Oil/Ipdi Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Caffeine, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Arginine/Lysine Polypeptide, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Artemisia Vulgaris Oil, Barosma Betulina Leaf Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Water/Aqua/Eau, Limonene, Linalool, Sorbic Acid, Pentylene Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Blue 1 (Ci 42090).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Outline Your Lips: Using the pointed tip of the tear drop applicator, start by outlining your lips. Begin at the cupid's bow and work your way to the corners, following the natural shape of your lips.Fill In: Once the outline is complete, use the flat side of the tear drop applicator to fill in the rest of your lips with color. Swipe the lipstick evenly across your lips, making sure to cover all areas.Build Up Color: For a more intense color payoff, apply additional layers.
ingredients: Pentylene Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: Not for me!
reviews.comments: The color was a nice shade.  The lipstick is very soft, so I found I couldn't press hard.  The plumping ingredients were very irritating, and I didn't like the sensation so I returned the product.

reviews.headline: Plump works
reviews.comments: Love Jam Jam! . The plumping effect might not be for everyone, but honestly it's the only thing that actually amps up my lips without filler. Super easy to toss in my bag and go. Total staple!

reviews.headline: So pretty
reviews.comments: This lip product is my holy grail, the color is perfect and i love the plumping effect!!❤️

reviews.headline: If hot sauce was a lip product
reviews.comments: Holy cow!!! I was expecting some light tingling similar to the makeup by mario lip plumping serums. The minute I applied this, my lips started to BURN relentlessly. Immediate return for me!

reviews.headline: I would not purchase this lipstick again.
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, this lipstick caused some kind of allergy that left my lips stinging and uncomfortable. I applied it over several days to make sure it was are rare occurance but each time I wore the lipstick it left my lips stinging. I must return it for something else.  This has never happened to me before with other  brands.

reviews.headline: Applied Chunky and Too Spicy
reviews.comments: Product applies chunky, has to be spread out with fingers or brush.  The burn was too intense for me, I had to immediately remove the product with cleansing oil. I could feel the burning on my tongue too.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love the color and the glossiness.

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: The plumping sensation feels too much like burning or an allergic reaction that I don't enjoy wearing the lipstick. I think this one will be going back—for the price, I'm not going to tough it out.

reviews.headline: Color is completely different.
reviews.comments: Fog fantasy is definitley brown and in now way peach like the picture.  I enjoy the burn though.

reviews.headline: gorgeous gorgeous effect on lips
reviews.comments: its spicy for sure and i wasn't prepared for that, but now i love it. definitely tingles the lips and leaves this beautiful plump that lasts under the color. i love the blue ice and the pink jam.

reviews.headline: Buttery and smooth
reviews.comments: Im more of a lipgloss girl than lipstick but this one is so buttery and glides on smoothly. If you are more of a matte lip person than this is not for uou. I live the shine and hydrating feeling this lipstick gives me. I weng woth Jam Sesh and its the perfect mauve pink color without being too pink.

reviews.headline: HARD no for me.
reviews.comments: The "plumping" feature is next level. I feel like I rubbed habanero peppers on my lips. Tried to wipe off and still burning.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: Color is pretty, but my lips don't burn like this even when I'm eating really spicy food. In the beginning it's so intense it actually hurts a bit, and I forgot and licked my lips and that was awful too. This is going back.

reviews.headline: Nothing like it
reviews.comments: I love the blue color because there is nothing else that gives this cool wash of color and light plumping. Jam Sesh is also really pretty. The red shade is beautiful but it's more sheer so you may need an extra application to get a more intense color but the texture is so nice!!

reviews.headline: Its a yes
reviews.comments: Definitely a bit spicy but it plumps for me, and the color is subtle but I like that since the texture is so delicious. Blueberry was a bit intimidating but it actually leaves a very beautiful, cool wash over the lips and I like pairing it with other colors.

reviews.headline: IT'S A 10
reviews.comments: Gorgeous color    Get compliments everytime i wear it.   Tingling sensation is minimal.  Ordered a backup immediately.

faceoff_positive.comments: I got all of the colors and really like them all!! They are very creamy and leave an even layer of color across the lips. I am medium skin tone and was worried that Jam Sesh might be too light and leave the milky lines that some of the lip glosses do, but this is perfect with a lip liner! Im still trying to figure out how to incorporate Blueberry Ice into my routine since I can't use it on its own, but with other colors it's not bad. There is a little warm sensation for the plumping but it's not painful. I would definitely recommend!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing! Make lips look really smooth and hydrated

faceoff_negative.comments: Purchased this in fig fantasy because it sounded exactly like what I wanted. Firstly it came a little melted (possibly from the weather- it was very hot this weekend). It is just decent. The color is actually very pretty but the formulation is okay. It takes a few swipes to get your desired color and the container is TINY so the value for money really isnt there. I also find it pretty drying and the staying power is about an hour and a half. Thats not super surprising for a glossy formulation but if you have tried hourglass phantom lip balm that is a similar formulation but much better and stays on for hours. Personally wouldnt recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Meh
